caption:
This photograph captures a lively outdoor concert scene during twilight. The setting is an urban park, framed by towering skyscrapers illuminated with numerous lights, suggesting this is a major city center, possibly New York City due to the density and style of the buildings.

In the foreground, a large crowd of spectators is gathered, with many people standing or seated, watching a performance. Their attention is focused on a large, well-lit stage housing multiple performers and musical equipment. The stage is set up with scaffolding, lighting rigs, and large speakers, indicating a significant public or festival event.

The stage features a banner that reads "Chase Music Festival," which presumably is the name of the event being held. The density of the crowd and their casual attire suggest a relaxed, communal atmosphere typical of a music festival.

As natural light fades, artificial lighting from the stage brightly illuminates the performers, making them a focal point against the more dimly lit audience and the brightly lit skyline in the background. The skyscrapers serve as a dramatic backdrop, their windows glowing like a grid of lights providing a strong contrast to the darkening sky.

The overall composition of the photo, from its vibrant city backdrop to the energetic crowd and the focal point of the brightly lit stage, captures a dynamic urban event filled with music and community engagement.
title: The schaefer bandstand in central park on a clear june evening.  Lights begin to shine in the buildings overlooking the park a concert by singer judy collins is in progress
